member.name: M:GetInItBackEnd.Controllers.AccountController.RegisterCompanyAccount(GetInItBackEnd.Models.Account.CreateAccountDto)
member.param: Data Transfer Object containing information required to register a new company account.
member.returns: An ActionResult indicating the outcome of the account registration process. If successful, returns a '201 Created' status along with the location of the new resource.

member.name: M:GetInItBackEnd.Controllers.AccountController.RegisterUserAccount(GetInItBackEnd.Models.Account.RegisterUserDto)
member.param: The Data Transfer Object containing the information required to register a new user account.
member.returns: Returns an ActionResult indicating the result of the account registration process. If the operation is successful, it returns a '201 Created' status along with the location of the new resource.
